You need to download Switch firmware to run this emulator (and "legally" get the games from somewhere).

To get firmware the easy way: search for RyuSAK, it's FOSS where you can download it. It's as easy to just download the firmware by searching "emulator files" (site emulation.gametechwiki) and download it manually and updating firmware from Ryujinx.

Have fun!
summary: Amazing emulator. Check my review if you have problems with this
